quoteText: Apple reserves the right at any time to modify this Agreement and to impose new or additional terms or conditions on your use of the Service, provided that Apple will give you 30 daysâ€™ advance notice of any material adverse change to the Service or applicable terms of service, unless it would not be reasonable to do so due to circumstances arising from legal, regulatory, or governmental action.
title: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a month or more in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
